Draft Rating:

D+

Jan Volk ranks in the 33th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Volk's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 6 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Reggie Lewis with 22th pick but was worth 8th pick.
  • Drafted Dino Radja with 40th pick but was worth 25th pick.
  • Drafted Brad Lohaus with 45th pick but was worth 42th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Brian Shaw with 24th pick but was worth 52th pick.
  • Drafted Sam Vincent with 20th pick but was worth 44th pick.
  • Drafted Michael Smith with 13th pick but was worth 29th pick.

Trade Rating:

F

Jan Volk ranks in the 9th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Bill Walton to BOS.
  • Lost Cedric Maxwell, Arvydas Sabonis to LAC.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Joe Kleine, Ed Pinckney to BOS.
  • Lost Danny Ainge, Brad Lohaus to SAC.

Signing Rating:

Their best signings:

Their worst signings:
